page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content:
Thorpe Willoughby is an expanding village. Since 1961 the population has increased from 292 to 2270. Many new houses have been built such as these which were for sale in June 1985.
{ROWAN CLOSE.}New two bedroom semi detached bungalow. Entrance hall, lounge,kitchen,two bedrooms. Garage space and gardens. Â£18,950.
{WOOD LANE.}Attractive four bedroom detached house. Solid fuel central heating. Hall,lounge,dining room, well equipped kitchen,cloakroom,bathroom and w.c.,garage,patio and medium sized gardens. Â£31,995.
{LONDESBOROUGH GROVE.}Executive style four double bedroom detached house, large plot,oil central heating and double glazing. Â£54,100.
